homeHero.title: Sudety Grand Trail
homeHero.description: An original project to conquer the highest peaks of all mountain ranges in the Sudetes.

complete.title: Complete Sudetes crossing
complete.description: The first trail that truly connects the Sudetes into one coherent story. You start from Jarno≈Çt√≥wek in the Opawskie Mountains, and after hundreds of kilometers, you stand on the summit of the mystical ≈ölƒô≈ºa and end your journey in Sob√≥tka. Along the way, you conquer everything ‚Äì from the highest ≈önie≈ºka to the lowest L√°zek. It's a complete, uninterrupted journey through the entire Sudetes, through their diversity, heights, and wilderness. One road. One challenge. One complete whole.

threeCountries.title: Three countries, one range
threeCountries.description: You wander through Poland, Czech Republic, and Germany ‚Äì three cultures, three perspectives, one mountain world. The trail crosses borders not only on the map but above all in the mind. It connects landscapes, languages, and rhythms of life, creating one common space from them. The Sudetes in full dimension. Without borders.

transformative.title: A journey that transforms
transformative.description: 900 kilometers and almost 30,000 meters of elevation gain. It's not just a path through the mountains, but a meeting with yourself. Every kilometer teaches perseverance, wonder, and humility towards nature. It's more than a route to traverse. It's an experience that stays with a person for a lifetime.

aboutHero.title: Meet the
aboutHero.subtitle: Creator of Sudety Grand Trail
aboutHero.description: The story of a guy from ≈Å√≥d≈∫ who decided to use his own legs to change the world for the better.

history.title: From passion, experience, and... dissatisfaction.
history.p1: I have traversed the Sudetes multiple times. More than once I discovered their secrets along officially marked trails. Yet none of the existing trails led me
history.p1Highlight: comprehensively through this incredibly diverse range
history.p2: That is why the idea of
history.p2Rest: , a trail that will become not only the culmination of my Sudeten wanderings, but also
history.p2Highlight: a new challenge for all mountain lovers

concept.title: It's not just another line on the map.
concept.p1Highlight: connects all mountain ranges of the Sudetes into one logical and demanding whole
concept.p2Part4: of elevation gain. It runs through
concept.p2Part8: ‚Äì Poland, Czech Republic, also touching Germany.
concept.p3: The start of the route is in
concept.p3Middle: , and the finale ‚Äì symbolic and majestic ‚Äì at
concept.p3EndDesc: , a mountain of spiritual significance, just below Wroc≈Çaw.

goal.title: Complete Sudetes crossing.
goal.p1: The goal of the trail is to conquer
goal.p1Highlight1: all the highest peaks of each range
goal.p1Middle: , and also ‚Äì on the Polish side ‚Äì all
goal.p1Highlight2: 16 Sudeten peaks belonging to the Crown of Polish Mountains
goal.highlightBoxRest: ‚Äì to the actual highest point and to the crown peak, if they differ. This makes the route even more demanding and unique.

legends.title: Legends of the Sudetes await.
legends.p1: The route will not lack iconic peaks ‚Äì from the majestic
legends.p1PeaksDesc: , the highest summit of the entire range, through the mighty
legends.p1Peaks3: and proudly towering over the Jesen√≠ky
legends.p2: And this is just the beginning of this mountain mosaic.

philosophy.title: For those who want to get lost to find themselves.
philosophy.p1Middle: , but also from the need to create something of one's own ‚Äì a path that not only leads through peaks, but
philosophy.p1Highlight2: connects ranges, countries, emotions, and experiences
philosophy.p2: is a proposal for everyone who wants to discover the Sudetes in their fullness ‚Äì not only physically but also
philosophy.p2Rest: . For mountain people ‚Äì wanderers, dreamers, loners, athletes ‚Äì for all who love mountains and want to face such a challenge.
philosophy.p3: This is a trail created for those who seek something more than just a marked path.

ending.title: Unpredictable adventure. Thoughtful concept.
ending.p1: I invite you to face this challenge ‚Äì on your own terms, at your own pace.
ending.quote: In space, in the rhythm of walking, in oneself ‚Äî Creator of Sudety Grand Trail
ending.cta: Ready for an unpredictable adventure through 24 Sudeten ranges?

step1.title: Register Crossing Attempt
step1.description: Before starting, fill out the crossing attempt registration form. You'll receive a free GPS tracker and will be visible on the live tracking map.

step2.title: Conquer the Trail
step2.description: Set out on the route with a GPS tracker. Your progress will be visible live to all observers. Conquer all 23 highest peaks of the Sudeten ranges.

step3.title: Submit Completion
step3.description: After completing the trail, submit your crossing with materials (photos, GPX). After verification, you'll join the official Hall of Fame!

benefit1.title: Free GPS Tracker
benefit1.description: Receive a professional Poltrax tracker completely free for the entire crossing duration. You don't need to buy equipment - we provide it!

benefit2.title: Live Tracking
benefit2.description: Your expedition live on the internet! Family, friends, and the entire community can track your every step through 900 kilometers of trail.

benefit3.title: Official Recognition
benefit3.description: After completing the trail, you'll join the elite group of conquerors. Your name in

benefit4.title: Community
benefit4.description: Join the exclusive group of those who have conquered the Sudeten Crown. Share experiences and inspire others to take on the challenge.

aboutCreator.photoCaption: "An ordinary guy from ≈Å√≥d≈∫ with a backpack and a head full of ideas"
aboutCreator.p1: As the trail creator, I thought it would be worth saying a few words about myself. Maybe then it will be easier to understand where I came from and how it happened that I'm trying to give meaning to everyday life in this way. Because although each of my projects is a different adventure, they all have a common beginning.
aboutCreator.p2Rest: , I don't have a team of trainers or sponsors on call. I'm an ordinary guy from ≈Å√≥d≈∫ who decided to use my own legs to change the world for the better. I have a backpack, shoes, a head full of ideas, and probably a bit too much ambition. For several years I've been wandering in the mountains, sometimes long, sometimes fast, most often with some stupid plan and an even nobler goal.
aboutCreator.p3: This site is a space dedicated to the project of my life, but it's only one chapter of a larger story. Because I've already walked several such wild, long, sometimes completely illogical routes in my life.
aboutCreator.p3Highlight: Each of these journeys changed me in its own way
aboutCreator.p3Rest: and led me step by step to where I am now.
aboutCreator.p4: It was they who taught me how important it is to appreciate those small, often unnoticed moments that really give life meaning. Thanks to them, I began to get to know myself anew, I came to like my flaws and virtues, I learned to live in harmony with myself, and above all
aboutCreator.p4Highlight: I understood who I really am and what I really need

cta.title: Join the Community
cta.description: If you want to find out how it all started, what drives me, and what mountains look like through the eyes of someone who knows the weight of silence and can find home in a place where others see only trees, I invite you to my private group.
cta.quote: "Because walking is not just kilometers. It's also people, emotions, failures, and small victories. And I just like to share that."

trailJourney.title: My report
trailJourney.description: 924 kilometers covered in 15 days. Each day is a separate story full of challenges, beautiful views, and unforgettable moments.
